p: The chemical composition of the essential oils obtained from P. lentiscus, P. terebinthus, P. vera, P. integerrima, and P. lentiscus var. chia was determined by gas chromatography analysis coupled with a mass spectrometer detector (GC/MS), with a Hewlett-Packard 6890-5973 system (Agilent Analytical Instruments Littleton, CO, USA).
